title: When Someone Tells Me How I'm Building Wrong

replies.body:
Then this happens.

{{champion:107}} (insta-gibs you) Different? You seem just as squishy as ever.

Excuse me?
Instagibs?
A champion with any tankiness?
NAH
Unless it's AP Reng, 400 extra health from Locket won't save Bard.
Unless the team is above b5 and understands basic Rengar counterplay so he has 0 kills and is now on the famine side of feast/famine...
Rengar dominates low elo in general, so any team above silver 1.

Nah...
Past b4 or so people generally understand at least the concept of armor and tanks...

ADC Bard

and

Support Yorick

My god the Odarths are scary

Top mid and jungle thresh
http://fc00.deviantart.net/fs71/i/2013/164/2/d/the_thresh_cream_man_by_cpu_pi-d68xu6s.png

Poor Kalista... thinking she was a top-tier multi-shredder adc:

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2218392245/43297115?tab=overview

\*Sigh\* The lessons I have to teach people...

\*Walks away, shaking head.\*
Still not as bad as ADCs that still rush infinity edge on MF and Lucian and just die in lane over and over again.
Welp, time to try {{champion:99}} {{item:3143}} {{item:3111}} {{item:3065}} {{item:3027}} {{item:3151}} {{item:3800}}  !
I wonder how Bard would act if given weed.
Perfect response to those bullies trying to force every support to build sighstone. Feel free to play the game how YOU want not how others want you to
...That's not them playing Bard as a Support. You can take "Support Champions" different places you know.

Wait.

Does this work.
At least you bought Locket
I had a Lee Sin build a Zhonyas the other night, I think that may of been the 1st time I've ever actually face palmed.

The bush is strong with this one
{{champion:86}}
Ikr, I get so much flame for full ap garen

Because it's bs. 
Build full magic pen, it's the only viable option against non-villains
The  problem is that they are using the wrong word. They mean inefficient.

{{champion:432}} {{item:3094}} {{item:1414}} {{item:3020}} {{item:3146}} {{item:3078}} {{item:3031}} 

Onward, my brethren!

Same here

http://matchhistory.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/#match-details/NA1/2244507085/230194055?tab=overview

Can't stop me
I'm crazy!
HNGSHAAHHASFJFJ

( just cause I like attackspeed shaco doesn't mean anything! ) :P

Ap thresh

Also {{champion:136}} boop

When trying to earn that helpful medal...
